result.execSummary:
All charges against Diana M Verhaagh in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Diana M Verhaagh is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

3:14 PM Defendant Diana M Verhaagh appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney David Vernon Penn appeared by video for Diana M Verhaagh.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Waiver of preliminary hearing.  Rights given.  Court finds that waiver is done so knowingly and voluntarily.  Probable cause found.  Bound over for arraignment on an information.  Information to be e-filed.  Waive reading.  Not guilty plea entered.  Bond continued.
Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for July 27, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Judicial Pretrial - in court on July 27, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

Defendant appears by video from the Vilas County Jail.  Attorney Penn appears by video.  DA Hayes appears in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense confirms receipt of complaint, waive formal reading.  Not guilty pleas entered.  Bond continued.  Preliminary hearing scheduled July 16, 2022 at 3:00 pm.

9:32 AM Defendant Diana M Verhaagh in court, in custody.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant states she called the public defenders office on Friday to have Attorney Penn appointed.  Defendant being held on a probation hold.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant appears by video in the Vilas County Jail without counsel. DA Hayes appears in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is public defender eligible. Court adjourns initial appearance to  May 16th at 9:15 am. bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on May 16, 2022 at 09:15 am.

9:18 AM Defendant Diana M Verhaagh in court, in custody.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has received complaint.  Attorney Penn represents defendant in other matters, and the public defender's office is currently unaware of Attorney Penn's status on appointment.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

1:07 PM Defendant Diana M Verhaagh in court, in custody.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant confirms receipt of criminal complaint.  Defendant does qualify for public defender.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 09:15 am.

DA Hayes speaks to the incident that occurred that resulted in the defendant's arrest. Bond set at $1,000 cash with conditions: Maintain absolute sobriety, Not to possess or consume intoxicants, No taverns or to be in the tavern portion of any restaurant premises. Bond form.
